creator: robertdboyce@rdbcci.com
text:
java.io.tmpdir is set to directory that does not exist (%CATALINA_HOME%\temp). In Tomcat 3 
this was set to an existing directory. Work around seems to be to create the directory. However, 
it should point to existing directory for default as it did in Tomcat 3.

This has been fixed already. Creating the directory is the obvious workaround.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 6400 ***
creator: remm@apache.org
